backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing menu items, transactions, and gift cards with CRUD operations and sorting helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a deployment-related feature, listing involved frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing various frontend files and their roles in the POS app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for the UI.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document defining page metadata, favicon, and React root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling tab navigation and receipt flow between POS, menu, gift card, history, and receipt views.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Reusable error display component featuring an alert icon, message, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header with branding, main content container, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutD: Checkout modal supporting cash, gift card, and simulated card payments with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/features/checkout/Simulated: Simulated credit card input form with formatting, validation, and a notice that payments are fake.
A dialog form for creating or editing menu items with validation for name, price, and optional category.
frontend/src/features/menu/MenuManagemen: Displays and manages the menu list, allowing adding, editing, and deleting items via hooks and a form modal.
frontend/src/features/pos/POSScreen.tsx: POS interface for adding menu items to a cart, adjusting quantities, and launching checkout to complete a sale.
frontend/src/features/receipts/ReceiptSc: Shows a printable receipt for a completed transaction, including items, totals, and payment details.
frontend/src/features/transactions/Trans: Lists all past transactions with summary details and allows viewing individual receipts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteTransactio: Provides a mutation to submit a transaction to the backend and store the resulting receipt locally.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftCards.ts: Defines mutations for issuing, fetching, and using gift cards through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider, handling auth client creation, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenu.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and modifying menu items via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light/dark themes plus print styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/state/transactionsStore.ts: Zustand store that persists completed transactions and supports adding and clearing them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, issues, features, and image requirements for the build.
